transcript:
Customer: Haan ji sir namaste.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Maine bola tha wo dekh ke aapko karne ka wo kar diya?
Executive: Sir aaj aadhi aap ek baar google meet pe main aapko show kar deta hu.
Customer: Kiya nahi.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hai kya kya keh rahe hain sir aap ek baar please clear kare ek baar aap.
Customer: Are main bola tha ke Balaji wale ka aur uska dekh ke isme dalne ka kya wo sab.
Executive: Sir Balaji wale ke keywords na wo che total keywords pade hue hain jo aapke keywords mein pehle se hi match ho rakhe hain koi agar dusri company hai jiske naam ke through main wo cheez add kar paun aap mujhe kisi dusri company ka naam bata sakte hain Balaji ke alava ke alava.
Customer: Himalaya.
Executive: Himalaya.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek minute check kar leta hu abhi lage hath Rajkot ki hai na sir.
Customer: Rajkot ki aap bolte ho Balaji ka keyword match hai hamare aur uska.
Executive: Haan haan sir aapke mein pata hai aapke mein aaj pade hue hain unke mein che pade hue hain theek.
Customer: Aap Himalaya ka main dekh le raha hu.
Executive: Himalaya ka ek bar check Himalaya Rajkot mein ban raha hai kya sir ji to.
Executive: By lead consumption sir aap kar rahe hain approach kariye kya problem aa rahi hai sir buyer se connect hone mein.
Customer: Approach to karte hain isme kam to banne chahiye na sir.
Executive: Kya problem buyer se jab aap connect karte hain sir kya problem aa rahi hai bataye aap.
Customer: Nahi aap dekh lena aap thoda aaram se dekho thoda.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Aapke thode wale trade nahi hai sir usme.
Executive: Bilkul sir bilkul 100% main aap mujhe bataye jo bhi issues hai.
Customer: Nahi main daily sab party ko reply bhi deta hu sab hota hai aap thoda dekh lijiye ke jo party mangti hai wo hamare paas hota hi nahi hai wahi cheez wo bolti hai.
Executive: Chaliye ek ek kam karenge na sir.
Executive: Do char buyers ko directly main connect karunga aapke aap hi ko on call pe kar lenge.
Customer: Theek hai jo by lead aap consume karoge recently available by leads ke according hum unse ek bar discuss kar lenge ki kya requirement hai aapko.
Customer: Aap thoda dekhiye usme problem kuch hoga hi to hi aise hoga kyuki samne wala mangta hai wo cheez aur hamari cheez mein koi likhne mein kuch gadbadi ho raha hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir main apne end se dekh leta hu agar aapko.
Customer: Thoda focus karo do mahina ho gaya hai ab faltu ka time nahi hai bar bar bolne ka.
Executive: Theek hai sir done hai done hai sir ek bar hum na next week mein ek bar google meet pe connect ho ke dobara se isko jo aapka buyer ka problem hai.
Customer: Aaj aap dekho aaj ya kal mein thoda dekh lo.
Executive: Sir main keh raha hu ki abhi to main us cheeze dekh leta hu ki aap kitna consumption kar rahe ho kitni der der mein kar rahe ho wo sab ek bar check kar leta hu fir buyers aapka kya hai kya response buyer de raha hai kya approach aap kar rahe ho kis tarike se buyer connect kar raha hai wo ek bar hum baith ke sath mein dekhenge abhi to main check karunga apne side se jo bhi cheeze hai jaise aap use kar rahe ho hai na kis kis buyer se connect kar rahe ho aap.
Customer: Pehle to call hi aana band ho gaya.
Executive: Call to abhi aa rahi hai sir aapke paas to.
Customer: Kitna call aaya hai dekho.
Executive: Char call aayi hai sir abhi tak total aapko.
Customer: Achcha char call kya ek hafte mein char call kya samjhe sir usme.
Executive: Sir ye isko bhi hum increase kar lenge keywords addition keywords add on karke sir calls ko increase kar sakte hain.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Ek din ka ek bhi call nahi hua.
Executive: Haan haan bilkul pichli bar aapko 22 call aayi thi uske pehle 30 call aayi thi main man raha hu bilkul man raha hu sir.
Customer: Thoda isme dekhiye sir isme se paisa kama ke aapko dena hai.
Executive: Are bilkul sir main chahta hu ki aur achcha paisa kamaye hum aur badi service mein all India ki service mein jaye.
Customer: Nahi hota hai na sir hum ye to waisi baat ho rahi thi fir kam nahi ban raha hai aapko dikhata hu na jhoot thodi bol raha hu.
Executive: Nahi bilkul sir aap sahi keh rahe hain main main puri ki puri cheezon ka jo bhi aap keh rahe ho na is cheez ko aage hum badhayenge sath mein coordinate karke.
Executive: Keywords addition ki aap baat kar rahe ho Himalaya se related us cheez ko add on karenge calls ka flow badhega inquiry ka flow badhega.
Customer: Haan wo dekh lo aaj ya kal mein aap aaram se dekh ke.
Executive: Haan haan nahi nahi sir ye to main kar hi dunga.
Executive: Overall iske alava koi dikkat hai to bataye aap jo buyer.
Customer: Dikkat to yahi hai yahi dikkat khatam ho jayegi sab khatam hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha approach buyer ka ek bar aap dekh lete hain na main cheez hai aapko conversion nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Aap akele handle karte hain sir aur bhi koi staff hai jo calls wals handle karte hain fir by lead.
Customer: Do aadmi handle karte hain.
Customer: Ek aap aur ek.
Customer: Ek bhai hai hamara.
Executive: Achcha theek hai to wo bhi by lead consumption karte hain wo bhi sari cheezon ko unke paas bhi knowledge hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek bar discuss karte hain sir ek bar dekhte hain dono side se kahan par kitni der mein kya kya ho raha hai.
Executive: Baki jaise hi main connect karke all ko karta hu fir aapse ek bar discussion karunga by leads ko leke theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to add keywords related to Himalaya.

- Not getting enough calls and conversions.

- The leads received do not match requirements.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to check the buyer approach.

- Executive will connect with buyers directly.

- Executive will check the consumption rate.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect to discuss by leads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, keywords, calls, himalaya
